action.action-desc: Mr. Mast introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal certain taxes imposed on heavy trucks and trailers sold at retail.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Reduce Taxes on our Trucks Act.

section.header: Repeal of certain taxes on heavy trucks and trailers sold at retail

subsection.text: Section 4051(a)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraphs (C), (D), and (E).
